tool_description: Returns Bionic Text from submitted text
name: Bionic Text
title: Bionic Text

api_list.name: Convert
api_list.description:
Converts text into Bionic Text. Will return html style bold tags. 

**Note:** Script will strip any html codes sent in
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bionic-text.p.rapidapi.com/Convert"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bionic-text.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
